Class Graph<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Graph<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - 

    public class Graph<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an ADT for a Directed Graph G=(V,A): -V is a set of vertices -A is a set of directed edges (arcs) Represented using adjacency tree: -modified adjacency list where instead of each row being a LinkedList, its a BinarySearchTree.
    Author:
    Jasmine Ishigami

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Graph.ArcIterator
      Nested Iterator over all arcs in the graph.
      class  Graph.InArcIterator
      Nested Iterator over all incoming arcs into given vertex.
      class  Graph.InVertexIterator
      Nested class Iterator over all incoming arcs to given vertex.
      class  Graph.OutArcIterator
      Nested Iterator over all outgoing arcs from the given vertex.
      class  Graph.OutVertexIterator
      Nested class Iterator over all outgoing vertices from the given vertex.
      class  Graph.VertexIterator
      Nested class Iterator over all vertices in the graph.
